{"id":926877302,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"8 months, 1 week","timestamp":1680475406,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/926877302/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Make The String Great","memory":"6.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool sameLetterDiffCase(char a,char b){\n        if(a==b)\n        return(false);\n        if(islower(a))\n        return(a==tolower(b));\n        return(a==toupper(b));\n    }\n    string makeGood(string s) {\n        stack<char> stk;\n        for(char c:s){\n            if(stk.empty() || !sameLetterDiffCase(stk.top(),c))\n            stk.push(c);\n            else\n            stk.pop();\n        }\n        s=\"\";\n        while(!stk.empty()){\n            s+=stk.top();\n            stk.pop();\n        }\n        reverse(s.begin(),s.end());\n        return(s);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"make-the-string-great","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
